citation.{{citation |url: http://www.sidneyluo.net/a/a02/022.htm |title=漢書 卷二十二 ‧ 禮樂志第二 |quote=Original text: 孟康曰：「象人，若今戲蝦魚師子者也。」translation: Xiàngrén (Imitators) are like those [dancers] who act as frogs, fish, or lions today}}
